Text:
- 140 hours of encoding to get rid of the mosquito noise.
- 31 subtitles OCR'd directly from blu-ray by myself. 
- I hope you approve of this. ;)
no fan at all of western movies, but this compilation made me want to know it

Thanks for the work on this, room101bellboy.  I must admit I haven't gotten to watch these classics yet, but this sounds like the perfect copy to have.  

Cheers :)
its called the dollars trilogy... seriously people, cmon
the soundtrack alone is worth it
Thanks for the upload ....thanks for taking the time ..............audio commentary ????

Thanks 
Bellboy .Lot of hardwork u've done man no words 2 thank..i'll seed...great job hat's off...plz keep going with more classics..thanks +1 for this

3 of my favourite films - which I have - but not in HD. I just can't resist - not too mention the improved soundtrack quality of the amazing Morricone music! A lot of hard work that I am going to really appreciate - thanks!
thanks a lot bellboy. i am waiting for your once upon a time in the west rip.
Great work, works perfect with VLC but if it is possible I need the the original subtitle files (sup or whatever format) because the OCR file for greek subs is fucked up beyond repair.
My thanks and respect for this and *all* you dedicated work.  Hasta la victoria, siempre!!
